source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.headline: Learn how to master painting like the Dutch artist Van Goh in this step by step tutorial

Get started with world famous artists and learn their style of painting.
3 Projects on “SUNFLOWERS”, “BEDROOM” and ”STARRY NIGHTS”

objectives_summary: How to research answers to you or your characters' questions, how to interview people and how to find stories in your research.

items.title: The Writer in You

objectives_summary: Remind yourself why you write and what inspires you
Uncover what you want your writing career to ultimately look like
Examine your current writing routine and practices, and identify why they might not be working

items.title: Let's Write Horror: A Startling Start
items.headline: Fun and Scary Creative Writing
objectives_summary: Knowing the basics of what you'll need for most Horror stories and learning better ways to overcome creative blocks
Discovering what you want to write within the Horror genre based on another creator's approach
Making, organizing, and sharing notes to build an engaging and spooky mystery

items.title: Miss Kay's Art Class
items.headline: Creative fun!
objectives_summary: fun art activities
try these art activities for some fun art inspiration!

items.title: How To Create ANYTHING!
items.headline: Learn four easy steps to find, expand and finish a creative ANYTHING, even if you  think you "aren't creative."
objectives_summary: Learn the principles of creativity that you can apply to any project.
Recognize the roadblocks to creativity that you may encounter, and remedies to overcome them so you can move forward.
Practice how to use a creative process to maximize the quantity and quality of your creative activities.

items.title: LEARN TO WRITE AND SELF-PUBLISH YOUR BOOKS
items.headline: Self -publishing
objectives_summary: How to write and self-publish books
How to choose a title & subtitle for your book
How to determine the size of your book. get a professional cover designed for your book

items.title: Seascape Oil Painting course with pencil drawing
items.headline: This is a comprehensive painting tutorial with a whole range of techniques to help you with any seascape painting.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, students will be able to paint a realistic seascape painting.
Learn various techniques for painting seawater and sea waves crashing with rocks.

Students will also learn about color mixing, which colors should use for seascape painting, pencil sketch marking before start the color work, monochrome sketch marking before start painting and all aspects of starting and finishing a painting

items.title: Radio Commercial Production With Adobe Audition CC
items.headline: Simple Steps To Professional Radio Commercial Production
objectives_summary: How to reduce noise in an audio file(voice).
Tips and tricks on how the Adobe Audition CC can enhance your voice.
Detailed step-by-step training on every part of the edit process.

items.title: Intuitive Mixed Media
items.headline: Create work that is fun, intuitive and contemporary
objectives_summary: How to create while being open minded about materials
Understanding the pros and cons of a variety of media
How to make while using materials that you already own
